I bought this harness bc of how inexpensive it was, to see if adding an accessory like this would actually get worn (didn’t want to invest in something maybe I wouldn’t like *on* me) upside is it is very cute and comfortable and I ended up wearing it all the time! So much so the poor quality of the leather really started to show and started coming apart. Also bc of all the comments saying the sizing was off I bought the size larger and I’m sorry I did- it was way too big to wear with tight fitting clothes. I advise go with your measurements. All in all it was exactly what I needed it to be, a low key way to check if I wanted to invest in a nicer piece. Do not expect this to stay looking nice if worn regularly
